title: The Fiend
content: l 5 Enchantment ActionLevel 5 Warlock Spell Slot Paralyse a creature. It can't move, act or react. Attacks from within 3m are always Critical Hits. 10 turns 18m WIS Save Concentration Seeming Lvl 5 Illusion ActionLevel 5 Warlock Spell Slot Disguise up to 4 members of your adventuring party. 18m Telekinesis Lvl 5 Transmutation ActionLevel 5 Warlock Spell Slot Throw a creature or object up to 18m with a thought. Once per turn, you can use Telekinesis again without expending a spell slot. 10 turns
